website_summaries.verdict: Released just in time for the 30th anniversary of the heritage running sneaker, the Saucony Azura packs a lot of retro vibes in its aesthetics from the color blocking to the synthetic microsuede and ripstop mesh upper.One of Saucony’s affordable sneakers, it has quite a reputation during its heydays in the ‘80s as a lightweight runner with dependable stability and durability. Now that the retro sneaker gets a timely revival, it sends throwback vibes further enhanced by the comfort and overall style of the classic kick.
pros: Majority of sneaker reviewers love its retro design and colors
Most reviewers find the Saucony Azura comfortable
A good number of reviewers say it runs true to size
The classic styling goes well with so many clothes and outfit
The low-top Saucony Azura sneaker has a durable construction and high-quality materials according to some observers
A few users say the mesh and textile combination in the upper provides needed breathability
One reviewer says the lightweight feel and durable construction makes the shoe ideal for short runs and gym workouts
Some customers find them reasonably priced and surprisingly affordable
A reviewer says the Saucony Azura running shoe is an underrated release that has fantastic features
cons: A couple of wearers say it felt narrow for those with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Fake Saucony
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this product , they are fake . I am a lover of Saucony shoes, but the material this shoes are made of is no look like the original , I lost usd 85
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Okay With Casual Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear casually when running errands because the price was $30 when I got them in Jan 2020. I don't use them for running or working out at the gym, I use my $100 Saucony ISO Hurricanes for that. However, I bought these in size 9 and they fit perfectly. I buy the Hurricanes in 9.5 Wide because my feet expand when running. I recommend them for a casual Friday jean look and you want something different than the traditional Nike and Adidas gym shoes.
customer_reviews.author: James Lofton

customer_reviews.title: High quality shoes, feel slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look real cool and of good quality material. Heel cushion tech pushes foot forward slightly, especially when standing, leaving toes to feel a bit cramped. If broken-in, could probably get some more wiggle room, but I’m going to try out a half-size bigger and see if that’s more comfortable. UPDATE: getting a half size bigger did the trick. Toes don’t feel cramped and shoes feel better to walk around in. Would recommend for anyone with average or slightly wide feet

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Azura Sneaker
product_meta.description: For over 120 years, our mission has been to make the very finest athletic footwear. This year, we are introducing shoes designed for today's sophisticated consumer. The azura is one of our original patterns and we are bringing it back in the original colorways as well.

Soft fabric lining and additional tongue and collar cushion
